diff_hunk:
@@ -73,11 +73,19 @@ def param_shape(self):
 
     @property
     def mean(self):
-        return self.probs.new([float('nan')]).expand(self._extended_shape())
+        # verbose because of differening Variable/Tensor apis and lack of dtypes
+        if isinstance(self.probs, Variable):
+            return variable(float('nan')).type_as(self.probs).expand(self._extended_shape())
body: I think we'll have to call device explicitly for now; we'll add dtype and device parameters to variable and probably have a factory that sets those based on an existing instance (new_data?)
